participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys trying new things and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun. I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking. My favorite band is Bon Iver. I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing. I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and laid-back, enjoys spending time with loved ones and working on personal projects.
participant_2.background: I love celebrating Diwali with my family. I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends. I'm not going to go the extra mile anymore. I am the youngest sibling in my family. I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia.

content.text: Hey there, it's going good! Just relaxing and catching up with some friends.
Oh nice! What are you guys up to?
Just talking about our plans for the weekend. We're going to a Diwali celebration and I'm really excited!
That sounds like fun! I've never been to a Diwali celebration before.
Oh wow, you're in for a treat! Diwali is a really fun holiday and there's always lots of good food and music.
Well, I'm looking forward to it! What are you most looking forward to?
I'm really looking forward to seeing all of my family and friends. We don't get to see each other very often, so it's always a special occasion when we do.
That's really sweet! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Hey, so what do you do for work?
I'm a mechanic. I work on cars and trucks.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I've always been interested in cars, but I don't know much about how to fix them.
It's not that hard! You just need to have a good understanding of how engines work and be able to follow instructions.
I'll have to keep that in mind! I've always wanted to learn how to fix my own car.
You should! It's a great skill to have.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely look into it.
